local_intent: Confirm plate visibility and move above it by 0.05m to prepare for placement.
assumptions: DetectObject provides a valid plate pose usable by MoveAbove.
IsAt 'plate' is satisfied when the end-effector is at the above-plate approach pose.
coherence_with_global: Matches the transfer phase in the global tree: detect the plate, move above it with the same timeout and offset, and verify arrival before placement.
